statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_data WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT id, post_content, likes_count FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_date, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 6 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT id, comments_count FROM social_media_data WHERE likes_count < 50 AND sentiment_score < 0.2;
SELECT id, post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_data WHERE post_content LIKE '%exciting%' OR post_content LIKE '%amazing%' ORDER BY likes_count DESC, comments_count DESC
SELECT id, post_date, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE likes_count > 1000 AND comments_count > 500 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' AND post_date < '2022-12-31' AND sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY post_date ASC
SELECT id, post_content, likes_count FROM social_media_data WHERE likes_count > comments_count AND sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY likes_count DESC
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date, brand_id FROM social_media_data;
SELECT post_date, post_id, post_content, brand_id FROM social_media_data;
SELECT brand_id, post_content, post_date, post_id FROM social_media_data;
SELECT analysis_id, post_id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT sentiment_score, analysis_date, post_id, analysis_id FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_data WHERE brand_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data JOIN sentiment_analysis ON social_media_data.post_id = sentiment_analysis.post_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC

SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data JOIN sentiment_analysis ON social_media_data.post_id = sentiment_analysis.post_id WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' AND brand_id = 2 ORDER BY post_date ASC

SELECT post_id, analysis_id, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data JOIN sentiment_analysis ON social_media_data.post_id = sentiment_analysis.post_id WHERE post_content LIKE '%new product%' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT DISTINCT brand_id, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM social_media_data GROUP BY brand_id HAVING post_count > 10 ORDER BY post_count DESC
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_content FROM Social_Media_Posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, followers_count FROM User_Information WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM Sentiment_Analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM User_Information ORDER BY user_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Posts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM Social_Media_Posts WHERE user_id = 2 AND post_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT u.user_name, s.sentiment_score FROM User_Information u JOIN Sentiment_Analysis s ON u.user_id = s.post_id WHERE u.followers_count > 100 ORDER BY s.analysis_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment FROM Sentiment_Analysis GROUP BY post_id HAVING avg(sentiment_score) > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_sentiment DESC;

SELECT u.user_name, u.user_email, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM User_Information u JOIN Social_Media_Posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id GROUP BY u.user_name, u.user_email HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY post_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users;
SELECT user_id, followers_count, location FROM social_media_users ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM sentiments WHERE sentiment_type = 'positive';
SELECT post_id, shares_count, engagement_type FROM engagements ORDER BY shares_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 100 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, followers_count, location FROM social_media_users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 500 ORDER BY comments_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 AND sentiment_type = 'positive';
SELECT post_id, shares_count, bookmarks_count FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'like' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT username, followers FROM social_media_accounts WHERE account_type = 'business';
SELECT username, posts_count, last_post_date FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY posts_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, comments_count FROM posts WHERE comments_count < 10 ORDER BY post_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers > 1000 ORDER BY posts_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, followers FROM social_media_accounts WHERE account_type = 'business' ORDER BY followers DESC, last_post_date ASC;
SELECT username, posts_count, followers FROM social_media_accounts WHERE account_type = 'personal' AND followers < 5000 ORDER BY followers ASC;
SELECT p.post_id, p.post_content, c.comment_content FROM posts p JOIN comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id WHERE p.likes_count > 100 AND c.username = 'user123' ORDER BY p.post_date DESC;
SELECT p.post_id, p.post_content, s.sentiment_score FROM posts p JOIN sentiment_analysis s ON p.post_id = s.post_id WHERE s.sentiment_score > 0.7 ORDER BY s.analysis_date ASC LIMIT 10;
